medical_history.chief_complaint: Lower abdominal pain worse on the right
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Gradual onset over one day. The pain is associated with nausea, chills, and nonbloody diarrhea. No vomiting or urinary symptoms. No ill contacts identified.
medical_history.past_medical_history: history of atrial fibrillation on Coumadin, seasonal allergies
